name: ApolloShield
headline: ApolloShield is a system that detects unwanted drones and drives themâ¦
description:
Detect and safely block unwanted drone intrusions. Track down and arrest unauthorized operators.

Developed by experts from Israel Defense Forces and currently serving more than 25 countries, ApolloShield is the world leader in detecting and blocking drone intrusions, as well as tracking down and arresting unauthorized drone operators.
markdown:
raw_markdown="Toggle navigation [![logo](http://www.apolloshield.com/img/apollo-logo-transparent.png)](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#page-top>)

# Detect and BlockUnauthorized DroneIntrusions
Detect and classify all aerial threats. Send unauthorized drones back home, safely. Track down and catch malicious operators. 
[ Watch Video Demo](http://www.apolloshield.com/<https:/https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rq7zXTO7cns&t=11s>)
[Explore Unique Benefits](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#unique-benefits>)
[](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#unique-benefits>)
## ApolloShield's Unique Benefits
### AI-Assisted Drone Threat Library
ApolloShield's radio frequency research team uses artificial intelligence to identify new drone threats, making ApolloShield's drone library a leader in the industry.
### De-Sync Drone Blocking (Beta)
ApolloShield's de-synchronization technology is safer than other drone countermeasures, kinetic or RF-based (jamming / takeover). Book a demo to learn more.
### Single Vendor, 100% Protection
ApolloShield sells and integrates the complete spectrum of cUAS and counter-drone systems. All of our products are field-proven and seamlessly integrated.
### VIP Support and Customizations
ApolloShield's expert problem solver engineers are laser-focused on tailoring innovative solutions to tackle our customers' unique problems.
[ Book a Demo](http://www.apolloshield.com/<https:/airfence.typeform.com/to/KoHTVz>)
[Explore Products](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#products>)
## ApolloShield's Counter-Drone Products
![Antenna](http://www.apolloshield.com/img/antenna.png)
### ApolloShield Omni RF Sensor
  * Industry-leading drone detection library
  * Detects drone presence within range
  * Up to 1 mile (1.6 km) range
  * Built-in CAT-5 and GSM connectivity
  * 3-minute setup, no training required
  * Ideal entry-level sensor
  * [Request Data Sheet](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#contact>)


![ApolloShield Anti-Drone System](http://www.apolloshield.com/img/ApolloShield_system.png)
### ApolloShield Directional RF Sensor
  * Industry-leading drone detection library
  * Detects direction of approach
  * Customizable accuracy: ±45° - ±5°
  * Customizable range
  * Multiple sensors can triangulate drone/operator
  * [Request Data Sheet](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#contact>)


![ApolloShield Sense&Block product](http://www.apolloshield.com/img/AS_SenseBlock.png)
### ApolloShield RF Sense&Block
  * Plug & Play, automatic “protection bubble” against commercial drones
  * Detects drones and immediately triggers the built-in jammer that blocks them
  * Easy to carry and to set up
  * Industry-leading drone detection library
  * Blocks all drone types, including autonomous drones
  * [Request Data Sheet](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#contact>)


![Jammer gun](http://www.apolloshield.com/img/jammer_gun.png)
### ApolloShield RF Gun
  * Blocks all drone types, including autonomous drones
  * No backpack, weighs < 4 kg (9 lbs)
  * Affordable and easy to operate
  * Ideal entry-level blocking tool
  * [Request Data Sheet](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#contact>)


![jammer](http://www.apolloshield.com/img/Jammer.png)
### ApolloShield RF Jammer
  * Blocks all drone types, including autonomous drones
  * Stationary, mobile, vehicle versions
  * Omnidirectional or directional coverage
  * Non-jamming De-Sync (beta)
  * [Request Data Sheet](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#contact>)


![Police car](http://www.apolloshield.com/img/police_car.png)
### ApolloShield RF Locator
  * Vehicle-mounted system
  * Tracks down remote control signal
  * Intuitive driver app
  * Catch unauthorized drone operators in minutes
  * [Request Data Sheet](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#contact>)


![Dashboard](http://www.apolloshield.com/img/ApolloShield_screen.png)
### ApolloShield Command Center
  * Real-time alerts: SMS, Email, API
  * Automatic or manual intrusion blocking
  * On-premise or cloud operation
  * Integration with other systems
  * [Request Data Sheet](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#contact>)


[ Book a Demo](http://www.apolloshield.com/<https:/airfence.typeform.com/to/KoHTVz>)
[Explore Concept of Operation](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#concept-of-operation>)
*** Notice for U.S. customers:** All ApolloShield devices have not been authorized as required by the rules of the Federal Communications Commission (FCC). These devices are not, and may not be, offered for sale or lease, or sold or leased, until authorization is obtained.
**** All ApolloShield jammers:** This devices are not, and may not be, offered for sale or lease, or sold or leased, in the United States, other than to the United States government, its agencies, and its properly delegated representatives.
The use of those devices in the United States by other persons or entities, including non-federal government agencies, is prohibited by federal law. In other jurisdictions, sales will be conducted only in compliance with the applicable laws.
## ApolloShield's Concept of Operation
### Identify all Drone Threats
ApolloShield's advanced radio frequency fingerprint technology can detect, classify and identify the communications of all drones and remote controls sold off the shelf, wholly or in parts.
### Block Unauthorized Drones
ApolloShield de-synchronizes unauthorized drones from their remote controls, causing them to return home and not affecting critical communications. Selective blocking capabilities coming soon.
### Track Down Unauthorized Operators
ApolloShield’s patent-pending remote control tracking system leads your mobile security staff directly to the unauthorized operators, wherever they may hide.
### Everything Interconnects
All of ApolloShield’s products are developed and tested by a single source, you can rest assured that everything will work together out of the box.
[ Book a Demo](http://www.apolloshield.com/<https:/airfence.typeform.com/to/KoHTVz>)
[Contact ApolloShield](http://www.apolloshield.com/<#contact>)
## Contact ApolloShield
Ready to get protected? That's great! Book a demo, Call, or email us your requests. We respond quickly.
[ Book a Demo](http://www.apolloshield.com/<https:/airfence.typeform.com/to/KoHTVz>)
[1-813-586-4468](http://www.apolloshield.com/<tel:1-813-586-4468>)
info [at] ApolloShield.com

generated_description:
### ApolloShield: Safeguarding the Skies from Unwanted Drones

ApolloShield, founded in 2016 as part of Y Combinator's S16 batch, is on a crucial mission: to detect and neutralize unwanted drone intrusions, while also tracking and apprehending unauthorized operators. This Tel Aviv-based company is spearheaded by experts from the Israel Defense Forces and has quickly established itself as a leader in counter-drone technology, serving over 25 countries worldwide.

**What They Do:**
With a suite of innovative products, ApolloShield addresses a growing concern in security: drone threats. Their offerings include advanced systems designed to identify, block, and track drones flying where they shouldn't be. The technology they use is cutting-edge, employing Artificial Intelligence to continuously update their drone threat library, making it one of the best in the industry.

#### Unique Product Features:
- **AI-Assisted Threat Identification:** Their research team leverages AI for real-time detection and classification of drone threats.
- **De-Synchronization Technology (Beta):** A safer alternative to traditional jamming techniques, this system forces unauthorized drones to return home—without disrupting critical communications.
- **Comprehensive Protection:** ApolloShield serves as a single vendor for an entire portfolio of counter-drone systems, ensuring all components work seamlessly together.
- **Custom Solutions and Support:** Their engineers are dedicated to creating tailor-made solutions for unique customer needs.

#### Key Products:
- **ApolloShield Omni RF Sensor:** A user-friendly, entry-level detection system with up to a mile range.
- **ApolloShield RF Sense&Block:** This portable device not only detects drones but also automatically blocks them.
- **ApolloShield RF Gun and Jammer:** Lightweight and easy to operate, these tools provide effective blockage of drone operations.
- **ApolloShield Command Center:** This integrates all systems for real-time alerts and automatic blocking during drone incursions.

**Concept of Operation:**
ApolloShield’s technology identifies the communication systems of drones, allowing for precise targeting. Their methods prevent unauthorized drones from being active by returning them home, granting security teams the upper hand in neutralizing threats efficiently. Their patent-pending tracking system directs personnel straight to the rogue operators, making the entire process streamlined and effective.

### Conclusion
If you're looking for a way to enhance security in airspace, whether for industrial sites, public events, or even sensitive governmental operations, ApolloShield stands out with its advanced, field-tested solutions. Their products not only enhance safety but are also designed with customer-friendly features for easy implementation.

For more details or to schedule a demo, visit [ApolloShield’s website](http://www.apolloshield.com) or contact them directly. As drone technology evolves, ApolloShield is on the forefront, ensuring that our skies remain safe for everyone.
